property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, you lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a Problem faceoff involving this card, the opposing character with higher power than that of any other opposing character involved in the faceoff is no longer involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may pay [2] to frighten an opponent's Friend there.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you discard a card, you may pay [1] and turn this card to its Boosted side. If you do, choose an opponent. That opponent reveals their hand and separates it into two piles. Choose and banish one pile

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may look at the top card of any Problem deck. At the end of each opponent's turn, if that opponent played at least 2 cards that turn, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a card, if you played at least 2 cards this turn, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Troublemakers here lose and can't have abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +2 power for each frightened Friend in play.

property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, ready a character involved in the faceoff. When you play this card, you may ready a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, one of your cards involved in the faceoff gets +2 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play the last card in your hand, you may frighten a Friend here.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent's Mane Character is boosted, this card has Swift.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, frighten a Friend involved in the faceoff. When this card enters play, you may frighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card is involved in a faceoff, it has +2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, it has +2 power until the end of the faceoff. While involved in a faceoff, this card has +2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play the last card in your hand, you may move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is moved, choose one at random: Put a +1 power counter on it, or frighten it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Friends here with 2 or less power can't ready.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have a Friend in your discard pile, this card has +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [1] to unfrighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, flip an additional card. During faceoffs involving this card, flip an additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, one of your cards involved in the faceoff gets +2 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent's Mane Character is boosted, this card has +2 power and Stubborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card's Problem is solved, if this card would be sent home, it isn't sent home instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, exhaust a character with 2 or less power involved in the faceoff. When this card enters play, you may exhaust a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: While this card is flipped, opponents can't score points. Stubborn During faceoffs involving this card, players can't score points.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent's character is moved from here to another Problem, draw a card and move this card there.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, one of your cards involved in the faceoff gets +2 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is dismissed, dismiss all other Friends at its Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, gain control of an opponent's Friend involved in the faceoff until the end of the faceoff. When this card enters play at a Problem, gain control of an opposing Friend there until the end of the Score Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play at a Problem, it gets +1 power until the end of the turn for each other Friend you have at that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opposing Friend is dismissed, this card gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, choose an opponent. That opponent gains control of this card. At the end of your Main Phase, retire another Friend here. If you can't, retire this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each card in your opponent's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, dismiss a Friend with 2 or less power involved in the faceoff. When this card enters play, you may dismiss a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, you may end the faceoff. Faceoff: Retire this card to end the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, one of your cards involved in the faceoff gets +2 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [2] and exhaust this card to banish a Friend. At the start of the next turn, put that Friend into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: During your opponent's Score Phase, this card has -3 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, gain [1], banish this card, and flip another. When this card enters the discard pile from play, gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, you may pay [3] less for your next Event until the end of the faceoff. When this card enters play, pay [1] less for your next Event this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent's boosted Mane Character is here, this card's Problem can't be confronted.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent moves a character, you may exhaust this card to gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Main Phase, you may put a card from your hand on the top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents must pay +[1] to move characters to this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent's home limit is reduced by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent's home limit is reduced by 1 for each of their Assets in their home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, one of your cards involved in the faceoff gets +2 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, banish this card, put a card from your discard pile on top of your deck, then flip that card. Faceoff: Banish this card to put a Friend from your discard pile into play here. At the end of the faceoff, banish that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and pay [1] to move a Troublemaker to this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, banish a Friend involved in the faceoff, then banish this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, choose a Friend with an Accessory on it. Double that Friend's power until the end of the faceoff. This card has +2 power for each of your Accessories.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent loses a faceoff against a Troublemaker here, gain control of an opposing Friend involved in that faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent's Mane Character is boosted, that player can't play cards during faceoffs involving their Mane Character.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this card would be sent home from a Problem, it is sent to another Problem instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, put a Friend involved in the faceoff into its owner's hand. When this card enters play, you may put a Friend into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, one of your cards involved in the faceoff gets +2 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [1] to move this card to a Problem where you have a Critter or Foal Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: While this card has lower power than any other Friends here, you may exhaust it and pay [1] to put a Friend here into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, it has +1 power until the end of the faceoff for each of your Friends involved in the faceoff. Caretaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each of your action tokens.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, choose one of each player's flipped cards. Those players ignore those cards. Faceoff: Pay [1] to choose one of each player's flipped cards. Those players ignore those cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players can't score more than 2 points per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: If an opponent would score this card's Problem's bonus points, you score them instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players can't confront more than one Problem per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of the Score Phase, you may exhaust this card to choose an opposing Friend here. That Friend has -2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players can't draw more than 2 cards per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opposing Friend enters play here, it has -1 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of the Score Phase, you may move this card home.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of each opponent's turn, that player discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each color among Friends in discard piles.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Reveal the top card of your deck and you may draw it. If the card was a Critter Friend, you may pay [1] less to play that Friend this turn and you may draw another card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, an opponent discards a random card. Main Phase: All players discard 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: Choose two: Exhaust a character, ready a character, or dismiss a Resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the start of the Score Phase, your Critter Friends each get +1 power until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: If you have Fluttershy or Discord involved in this faceoff, flip an additional card. If you have Fluttershy and Discord involved in this faceoff, flip 2 additional cards instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose an opponent's Mane Character. Banish each Friend at that Mane Character's Problem with power less than or equal to the power of that Mane Character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, dismiss a Friend with printed power 3 or more. Faceoff: Dismiss a Friend with printed power 2 or less.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Move a Troublemaker to a Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: Put the card from the bottom of your deck on the top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Each player chooses a Friend card in their opponent's discard pile. The owners of each of those Friends may put them into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Troublemaker Faceoff: Flip an additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose a [Laughter] or [Kindness] character. That character gets +1 [Laughter] and +1 [Kindness] until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the start of your Troublemaker Phase, defeat an opponent's Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Dismiss a frightened Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: Choose two: Friends you control have +1 power until the end of the faceoff, unfrighten a Friend, or an opponent loses [1] and you gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, it gets +1 power for each opposing character involved in the faceoff. Faceoff: A Friend gets +1 power for each opposing character involved in the faceoff until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: Move an opponent's Friend to a Problem. That opponent may pay [1] to copy this effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose a [Loyalty] or [Kindness] character. That character gets +1 [Loyalty] and +1 [Kindness] until the end of phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opposing Friend enters play, move it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the start of any phase, choose a character. That character gets -4 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the start of any phase, banish one of your Friends. At the start of the next turn, put that Friend into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, choose a Problem. That Problem's bonus is 0 until the end of the turn. Reaction: After the start of the Main Phase, characters can't be moved this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose a [Laughter] or [Honesty] character. That character gets +1 [Laughter] and +1 [Honesty] until the end of phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose two: Dismiss a Friend with 2 or less power, put a Friend from your discard pile into your hand, or pay 2 less for the next card you play this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the start of the Score Phase, choose a Problem. Exhaust each character there with 2 or less power. If an opponent's Mane Character is Boosted, exhaust each character there with 3 or less power instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: Look at an opponent's hand. You may choose a card from it and put that card on top of that opponent's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: Choose two: Move one of your Friends, put this card on top of its owner's deck, or flip an additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose two: Dismiss a Friend without an attached Resource, put a Resource from your discard pile into your hand, or put an Accessory from your hand into play attached to a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After one of your Troublemakers is put into the discard pile from play, put that card into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Search an opponent's deck for a Friend and set it aside face-down. That opponent names a card and you reveal that Friend. If that Friend is the named card, that opponent may put it into play under his control. If not, you may put it into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, frighten a Friend at home. Main Phase: Frighten up to 2 Friends at home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one of your Friends at a Problem. Your opponent chooses one of their Friends at that Problem. Exchange control of those Friends until the end of the Score Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, all opponents lose an action token. Main Phase: An opponent loses 2 action tokens.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose two: Move an opposing character, opponents can't move their characters this turn, or draw three cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Troublemaker is uncovered, move up to 2 of your characters to that Troublemaker's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When you flip a Chaotic card, you may retire this card to score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. While that Friend has more Resources on it than any other Friend, that Friend has +1 power and is [Generosity], [Magic], [Kindness], [Honesty], [Loyalty], and [Laughter].

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend Main Phase: Exhaust this card to move one of your characters to this card's area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. While that Friend is the only Friend at its Problem, it has +3 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. That Friend is a Critter.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. At the start of a Problem faceoff involving the attached Friend, put this card and that Friend into their owners' hands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: While you have no [Honesty] Friends, you may exhaust this card. If you do, this card is also a [Honesty] Friend until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When you flip a Chaotic card, you may retire this card to dismiss all Friends with printed power 1 or less.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: Exhaust this card and discard a card to pay [1] less for your next Friend this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. That Friend loses and can't have abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When you flip a Chaotic card, your Friends involved in the faceoff each get +1 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. At the end of your turn, if a player has a Friend with more Accessories on it than any other Friend, that player gains [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When an opponent pays their last action token, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Problem. Troublemakers here have +2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When you flip a Chaotic card, you may exhaust this card to frighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. When that Friend's Problem is solved, if that Friend would be sent home, that Friend isn't sent home instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Troublemaker. Players can't challenge that Troublemaker unless they pay [2].

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: While you have no [Generosity] Friends, you may exhaust this card. If you do, this card is also a [Generosity] Friend until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Problem. Your opponent can't play Friends with 3 or more power to that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When you flip a Chaotic card, unfrighten all your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: While you have no [Laughter] Friends, you may exhaust this card. If you do, this card is also a [Laughter] Friend until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When a card enters a discard pile, you may exhaust this card to banish that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. If another one of your Resources would be dismissed, you may retire this card instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: While you have no [Kindness] Friends, you may exhaust this card. If you do, this card is also a [Kindness] Friend until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: While you have no [Loyalty] Friends, you may exhaust this card. If you do, this card is also a [Loyalty] Friend until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: While you have no [Magic] Friends, you may exhaust this card. If you do, this card is also a [Magic] Friend until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. At the start of an opponent's Main Phase, you may exhaust this card and pay [1] to choose a character. That character can't be moved until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When an opponent plays a card, put a Tip counter on this card. At the start of the turn, remove all Tip counters from this card. Opponents must pay +[1] to play cards for each Tip counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. At the start of a faceoff, you may pay [1] and exhaust this card to have players flip 1 fewer cards during that faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When you flip a Chaotic card, you may move an opposing character involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. You must control Discord to play this card. At the start of your turn, put a Chaos counter on this card. When you flip a non-Chaotic card, you may remove a Chaos counter from this card to ignore that card and flip another card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Rallying a frightened Friend costs +[1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home At the start of your turn, if an opponent has at least [3], gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an opponent's Mane Character. While that Mane Character is boosted, it loses and can't have abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When an opponent defeats a Troublemaker, they must pay +[2] to play the next card they play this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, retire it and gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: This card's power is equal to double the power of an opposing character here with the highest power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, each player retires a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of each player's Troublemaker Phase, that player retires a Resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a faceoff involving this card, dismiss a Friend with the least power among Friends involved in the faceoff. If you do, put a +1 power counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player draws a card, put a +1 power counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Troublemaker is defeated, you may pay [1] to put another Troublemaker from your hand into play here face-up.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Troublemaker is uncovered, you may uncover a face-down Troublemaker. Main Phase: Retire this card to challenge an opponent's Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Troublemaker Phase, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, an opponent may pay [2] to dismiss this card. (Doing so does not defeat this Troublemaker.).

property.name: Text
property.value: When a challenger defeats this card, they draw a card. When a challenger loses a faceoff involving this card, they discard a random card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing characters at this card's Problem lose and can't have colors.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is solved, each player with at least 1 Friend here chooses a Friend here. If that Friend would be sent home, it isn't sent home instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters with 3 or more power can't contribute their power to confronting this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent's Mane Character is boosted, that opponent needs +3 power to confront this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: While involved in a Problem faceoff, opposing boosted Mane Characters here have -2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player confronts this Problem, that player reveals the top card of their deck. If it's a Friend, they put it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it into their discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem enters play, each player with at least one action token draws a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Using the draw action during the Main Phase costs +[1].

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is solved, dismiss each Friend here.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there is a facedown Troublemaker here, players can't confront this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a character enters play here or is moved here, replace each Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players with 2 or more characters here can't move or play characters to this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player plays a Troublemaker here, that player may pay [2] to uncover it.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a player would score points for defeating a Troublemaker here, they score one fewer points instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is solved, each player with a character here gains [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: No more than 2 of each players' characters can contribute their power to confronting this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, each player may move one of their characters to this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player's home limit is reduced by 1 for each character that player controls here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, dismiss all Friends with 2 or less power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players must pay +[1] to play a Troublemaker here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Troublemakers don't prevent players from confronting this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a Problem faceoff here, each player may pay [1] to ready a character here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player confronts this Problem, that player moves one of their characters here home.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a Problem faceoff here, the player with the most power here puts one of their Friends here on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters here lose and can't gain abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Friends enters play, you may look at the top card of your deck. If those cards have the same printed power, you may reveal that card to turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of the Score Phase, you may pay [2] to give another character here +3 or -3 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [3] to gain control of an opposing Friend and turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, put 3 Momentum counters on it. While involved in a faceoff, this card has +2 power for each Momentum counter on it. At the end of your turn, remove a Momentum counter from this card. When you remove the last Momentum counter from this card, retire this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may exhaust an opposing character. While this card remains in play, that character does not ready during the Ready Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing Friends here lose and can't have abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, you may put it into play. This card has -3 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent plays a card, you may discard a card that shares a type with that card to gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of the turn, you may retire this card to skip the next Troublemaker Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, retire another one of your Friends. If you do, put a +1 power counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: As this card enters play, choose a non-Unique Friend. This card has the printed abilities of that Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, turn each Mane Character over. Main Phase: Turn each character over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. You must control Pinkie Pie to play this card. At the start of your turn, put a Harmony counter on this card. Main Phase: Remove a Harmony counter from this card to look at the top 2 cards of a Problem deck and put them back in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. You must control Rainbow Dash to play this card. At the start of your turn, put a Harmony counter on this card. Main Phase Reaction: After one of your Friends is moved to or enters play at a Problem, you may remove a Harmony counter from this card to move one of your other characters to that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of each player's Troublemaker Phase, that player banishes the top card of their deck. While that card remains banished, it has no color requirement and the player who defeats this Troublemaker may play that card as though it were in that player's hand.
